comment.body:
> @Alex-302 Do you agree that making the following rule more specific with a stack trace (or just delete) as [a related uAssets change](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/commit/42024418b678e6fa8a5bada9c4ba643a7adb0bec) is needed?
> 
> ```
> music.youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'playerResponse.adPlacements playerResponse.playerAds playerResponse.adSlots adPlacements playerAds adSlots')
> ```

This doesn't work for me, although it's worth noting that I've gotten to the "final stage" of youtube adblock blockers:
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/69743171/b30b849b-9f2e-497f-a3fe-874dcd520986)

I'm using brave browser with no issues now.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/162262#issuecomment-1754204794
@quick007 
With the suggested rule, please test the following rule that is originated from [uAssets commit change](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/commit/fc097c6dbf251bfde4730d81eb9ed2259730c4b3). 

```adblock
youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"adPlacements.*?true.*?\"\}\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key= method:POST')
youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"adSlots.*?true.*?\}\]\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key= method:POST')
youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"adPlacements.*?ytimg.*?\"\}\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key=')
youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"playerAds.*?\"enabledEngageTypes\":\"\d.*?\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key=')
```

I disabled this option, and let AdGuard do the filtering, so the issue seems to have disappeared. *fingers crossed it says that way*

comment.body:
> [#162262 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/162262#issuecomment-1754204794) @quick007 With the suggested rule, please test the following rule that is originated from [uAssets commit change](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/commit/fc097c6dbf251bfde4730d81eb9ed2259730c4b3):
> 
> ```
> youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"adPlacements.*?true.*?\"\}\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key= method:POST')
> youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"playerAds.*?true.*?\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key= method:POST')
> youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"adPlacements.*?ytimg.*?\"\}\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key=')
> youtube.com,youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com#%#//scriptlet('trusted-replace-fetch-response', '/\"playerAds.*?\"enabledEngageTypes\":\"\d.*?\}\}\]\,/', '', 'player?key=')
> ```

This seems to do the trick! Nice!
